https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5ZjMNJJabwBEnGVQoR2yoMEL9um.jpg Born free in the American West, Black Beauty is a horse rounded up and brought to Birtwick Stables, where she meets spirited teenager Jo Green. The two forge a bond that carries Beauty through the different chapters, challenges and adventures. Black Beauty
